QuestData.Title: Learn and Grow I: Seeds
QuestData.Description: Well, first things first! I'm going to need lots of help 'round here.$B$BIf we're going to be partners, you've got to learn how to harvest crops, and if you wanna harvest crops you gotta plant seeds!$B$BNow it's my understanding that a mister, uh... Grainfell? No, that wasn't it... Greedfill? That doesn't sound right...$B$BGreenfield! That's his name! He's the man to see for seeds.$B$BGreenfield's got a stall over at Halfhill Market, directly southeast of here - go see him and pick up some vegetable seeds.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Merchant Greenfield at Halfhill Market and acquire a Packet of Green Cabbage Seeds.
QuestData.CompletionText: How'd it go, partner? Did you get those seeds from Groanfur?$B$BErr... Greenfield?
QuestData.RewardText: He waved at me! And he gave you the first pack of seeds for free?$B$BWell, what a nice guy!$B$BYou're doing a great job so far. Here's a little... seed money. Hah!
